text: Mirny () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Beloselskoye Rural Settlement of Krasnogvardeysky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 10 as of 2018. There are 2 streets. == Geography == The settlement is located 6 km to the west from Beloye, on the right bank of the river Belaya River. == References == Category:Rural localities in Krasnogvardeysky District
title: Mirny, Krasnogvardeysky District, Republic of Adygea
